column5: i am going to basket lake in ten days it is by Ignace has any one fished the lake? any help would be greatly appreciatedthanks

Fished years ago. lots of walleye and pulled 5 over 10 # in the 6 trips i made up there. beautiful lake. i fished points mainly on the lake. Leeches were my best bait. dragged floating jigheads with lindy slip sinkers. Olga owned Basket lake camp back then, I think she sold. nice camp, long gravel road going back there then. that was in the late 80's.
